channel.description: Recent content in Svg on MDN Fiori

item.title: Iconography
item.description: The following is a list of icons used across MDN Web Docs. As part of each icon, the HTML used to add them to a page is included. Website Icons {% include "includes/icons/facebook.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/github.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/instagram.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/jsfiddle.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/linkedin.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/stack-overflow.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/twitter.svg" %} Arrows {% include "includes/icons/caret-down.svg" %} {% include "includes/icons/caret-right.
